title: Vidhi Sakha
desc: Litigation management system for the Health Department, Govt. of Bihar.
fullDescription: Vidhi Sakha is a comprehensive litigation management system designed for the Health Department, Government of Bihar. It streamlines the tracking and management of legal cases, ensuring timely responses and effective monitoring of court matters. The portal provides secure access for officials to view case details, update statuses, and generate reports, thereby improving transparency and accountability in legal proceedings.

title: Dak Pad (Jan Samadhan)
desc: Public grievance and application tracking portal for Bhojpur.
fullDescription: Dak Pad, also known as "Jan Samadhan - Lok Shikayat Evam Avedan Tracking Portal", is a citizen-centric web application designed for the public of Bhojpur. It empowers citizens to submit complaints and requests online and track their status. The system allows the administration to securely manage and resolve these cases, ensuring efficient public service delivery and grievance redressal.

title: UI/UX Design Kit
desc: A complete design system for enterprise applications, focusing on accessibility and consistent brand identity.
fullDescription: We developed a comprehensive design system to unify the digital products of a major enterprise. The kit includes a library of reusable components, detailed usage guidelines, and accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1). This system has streamlined the development process, ensured brand consistency across all platforms, and significantly improved the user experience for employees and customers alike.

title: Corporate Website
desc: High-performance corporate presence with advanced SEO optimization and dynamic content management.
fullDescription: A complete overhaul of a corporate website to improve performance and SEO rankings. We utilized Gatsby for static site generation, ensuring blazing fast load times. Content is managed via Sanity CMS, allowing the marketing team to easily update pages without developer intervention. The result was a 40% increase in organic traffic and a significant boost in lead generation.

title: Brand Strategy
desc: Rebranding campaign for a tech startup, including logo design, voice & tone guidelines, and marketing collateral.
fullDescription: We partnered with a promising tech startup to define their visual and verbal identity. The project involved extensive market research, competitor analysis, and workshops with stakeholders. We delivered a complete brand book covering logo usage, color palettes, typography, and tone of voice. The new brand identity successfully positions them as an innovative leader in their industry.
